description: THE INSTALLATION OF PLANT EQUIPMENT (INCLUDING 2 X WALL MOUNTED DRY COOLERS & 3 X VRF UNITS) AND EXTERNAL ALTERATIONS (INCLUDING RELOCATING DOORS, REPLACING SHOPFRONT & INSTALLATION OF 3 X BOLLARDS)
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Site Location Plan & Drawings 3919-08-A, 4397-0104 Rev P03 & 4397-0102 Rev P06.

Condition : 3 - The facing materials used in the development hereby permitted shall match those of the existing building in materials, style, colour, texture and, in the case of brickwork, bonding, coursing and pointing.

Condition : 4 - Noise levels, (expressed as the equivalent continuous sound level) LAeq (15 minutes), from the new air conditioning units combined shall not exceed LA90-5dB at the boundary with any residential property.

Reason:  To protect the amenities of the occupiers in the local vicinity.

Condition : 5 - Following the installation of the plant equipment, a post completion noise survey shall be undertaken and submitted to Council for approval, to ensure the specified levels as outlined above are complied with before use.

Reason:  To protect the amenities of the occupiers in the local vicinity.

Condition : 6 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.
